comment: For pos_tests I took the nr of positive tests multiplied by the proportion performed by the UK Government Testing Program (ie Lighthouse labs TaqPath PCR tests) from https://www.gov.scot/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-trends-in-daily-data/, prop SGTF from https://www.gov.scot/binaries/content/documents/govscot/publications/research-and-analysis/2021/12/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/documents/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/govscot%3Adocument/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper.pdf

For pos_tests I took half the total nr of positive tests (as ca half are Lighthouse labs TaqPath tests) from https://www.gov.scot/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-trends-in-daily-data/, prop SGTF from https://www.gov.scot/binaries/content/documents/govscot/publications/research-and-analysis/2021/12/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/documents/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper/govscot%3Adocument/omicron-scotland-evidence-paper.pdf
